alert_keep_offi.message: Please keep the official Ecosia chrome extension installed to keep all features !

search_explain.message: Ecosia searches can sometimes be less precise than those of google. For more specific searches you can use this google search box. (But you will not plant a tree ... it's a shame)

alert_thanks.message: Hey there ! Thanks you for installing our ecosia dark-mode extension ! :D

searchinput_placeholder.message: Start a search to plant trees ...

new_tab_infos.message:
Please keep the official Ecosia chrome extension installed to keep all features !
This extension is a "copy" of the ecosia extension. No income is generated from this extension and all rights are reserved to ecosia creators.

alert_rgpd.message: By clicking "Agree", you agree to allow us to retrieve primary information about the use of this extension in order to tailor it to your requirements. This data remains confidential and will not be resold or transmitted to any other service.

donate_message.message: I have been developing this extension for more than 2 years. Until now, I had given up trying to pay myself thanks to it and offer this extension to the community for free. I finally decided to share a donation button in order to be able to invest more in the development of this extension. Feel free to give 0.1, 1 or 5, in any case I thank you very much for the support!
